scripts.db:migrate: sh ./scripts/db.sh --db-name indexer-db --db-host db up  && sh ./scripts/db.sh --db-name processor-db --db-host db up
scripts.db:drop: sh ./scripts/db.sh --db-name indexer-db drop && sh ./scripts/db.sh --db-name processor-db drop
scripts.db:setup: CLITAG=${CLITAG:-latest} yarn db:up && CLITAG=${CLITAG:-latest} yarn db:migrate
scripts.redis:reset: docker-compose up -d redis && docker-compose exec redis redis-cli FLUSHALL
scripts.db:reset: yarn db:up && yarn db:drop && yarn db:setup
scripts.pre-e2e-test: CLITAG=${CLITAG:-latest} yarn db:setup && CLITAG=${CLITAG:-latest} docker-compose up -d
